berlin
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  berlin.Node

public class Node
extends java.lang.Object

Represents one component of the Map which is a graph (a set of nodes linked together). A node can be occupied by a certain number of soldiers of a player.

Method Summary
 boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
          Checks if this node is equal to another node
 java.util.List<Node> getAdjacents()
          Get the nodes that are linked to this node.

          Get the number of soldiers on this node.
 Player getPlayer()
          Get the owner of this node.
 java.lang.String getType()
          Get the type of the node which should be "node" or "city".
